sentences.en: But the food itself was barely digestible, and many team members suffered from diarrhoea or constipation.

sentences.en: Diarrhoea and vomiting are common and renal failure may develop.

sentences.en: Ebola is characterised by fever, diarrhoea, severe blood loss and intense fatigue.

sentences.en: Nausea, diarrhoea, and vomiting may accompany migraine.

sentences.en: The World Health Organisation is anticipating 1.5 m cases of diarrhoea.
